options.name: server-disable
options.description: Disable a command everywhere in this server

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the command you want to disable (for example 'avatar')

options.name: server-enable
options.description: Enable a disabled command everywhere in this server

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the disabled command you want to enable (for example 'avatar')

options.name: channel-disable
options.description: Disable a command in a specific channel

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the command you want to disable (for example 'avatar')

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want the command disabled in, default current channel

options.name: channel-enable
options.description: Enable a disabled command in a specific channel

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the disabled command you want to enable (for example 'avatar')

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want the command enabled in, default current channel
